00039 int     TF_TestThread::Prepare( int cnt )
00040 {
00041                 if( 0==cnt )
00042                 {
00043                     int res = pthread_attr_init(&m_attrThread);
00044                     if(res != 0) {
00045                         fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", "Stream not started");
00046                         throw( "Stream not started" );
00047                     }
00048 
00049                     res = pthread_attr_setdetachstate(&m_attrThread, PTHREAD_CREATE_JOINABLE);
00050                     if(res != 0) {
00051                         fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", "Stream not started");
00052                         throw( "Stream not started" );
00053                     }
00054 
00055                     res = pthread_create(&m_hThread, &m_attrThread, ThreadFunc, this);
00056                     if(res != 0) {
00057                         fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", "Stream not started");
00058                         throw( "Stream not started" );
00059                     }
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 int ret=m_isPrepareComplete;
00063 
00064                 return ret;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void* TF_TestThread::ThreadFunc( void* lpvThreadParm )
00068 {
00069         TF_TestThread *test=(TF_TestThread*)lpvThreadParm;
00070     void* ret;
00071     if( !test )
00072         return 0;
00073     ret=test->Execute();
00074     return ret;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void* TF_TestThread::Execute( void )
00078 {
00079                 PrepareInThread();
00080                 m_isPrepareComplete=1;
00081 
00082                 // Wait for Start function
00083                 pthread_mutex_lock( &m_StartMutex );
00084                 pthread_cond_wait( &m_StartCond, &m_StartMutex );
00085                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &m_StartMutex );
00086 
00087                 Run();
00088 
00089                 CleanupInThread();
00090 
00091                 m_isComplete=1;
00092                 return NULL;
00093 }
00094 
00095 void    TF_TestThread::Start( void )
00096 {
00097 
00098         // Start Thread
00099         pthread_mutex_lock( &m_StartMutex );
00100         pthread_cond_signal( &m_StartCond );
00101         pthread_mutex_unlock( &m_StartMutex );
00102 }

00104 void    TF_TestThread::Stop( void )
00105 {
00106         m_isTerminate=1;
00107         //fprintf( stderr, "%s - Ok\n", __FUNCTION__ );
00108 }

00115 /**
00116  *      \brief  get value from command line
00117  *
00118  *      format command line:
00119  *      <name1> <value1> <name2> <value2>
00120  *
00121  *      \param  argc            number of argument
00122  *      \param  argv            pointers to arguments
00123  *      \param  name            key of argument
00124  *      \parma  defValue        default value for arguments
00125  *
00126  *      \return   value of argument or default value of argument
00127  */
00128 int TF_TestThread::GetFromCommnadLine( int argc, char **argv, char* name, int defValue )
00129 {
00130         int ret=defValue;
00131         for( int ii=1; ii<argc-1; ii++ )
00132         {
00133                 if( 0==strcmp( argv[ii], name) )
00134                 {
00135                         ret=atoi( argv[ii+1] );
00136                 }
00137         }
00138         return ret;
00139 }
